description: This Java source file defines an interceptor component that logs detailed diagnostic information for API documentation endpoints, including timing, request details, and errors.

classes.name: ApiDocsLoggingInterceptor
classes.description: A Spring Component implementing HandlerInterceptor to log request and response details specifically for API docs endpoints, including start time, duration, status, and exceptions.

methods.name: preHandle
methods.description: Captures start time and logs request details if the request URL is an API docs endpoint.

methods.name: afterCompletion
methods.description: Logs the request outcome (success, failure, error) for API docs endpoints, including duration and exception details if any.

methods.name: isApiDocsEndpoint
methods.description: Helper method to determine if the request path targets API documentation endpoints.

methods.name: getStackTraceAsString
methods.description: Converts an exception's stack trace into a truncated string for logging.
